mapper.select: SELECT MENU.MENU_SEQ , MENU.MENU_PARENT_SEQ , MENU.PRO_CD , MENU.MENU_NM , MENU.MENU_ICO , MENU.MENU_ORDER , MENU.MENU_GROUP_YN , MENU.MENU_URL , MENU.USE_YN , (SELECT COUNT(MENU_PARENT_SEQ) FROM TB_NAMBI_MENU CNT WHERE MENU.MENU_PARENT_SEQ = CNT.MENU_PARENT_SEQ ) COUNT FROM TB_NAMBI_MENU MENU WHERE MENU.USE_YN = 'Y';
